Text:
TW, I hate making requests  but I've searched high & low for years for "Salvation!: Have you said your Prayers Today?" by Beth B (1987) and you're the only one on TPB who might be able to help! The soundtrack's available here.

I'll leave you with the IMDB link in case that helps: http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0093912/

Anyhow, thanks for all your efforts in what you do.

DD2K2

I cant say much for your research skills.                                                                                                                                                                                                          The film in question is available very inexpensively at the ebay site half dot com                                                                                                                                       Beth B has her own dot com website where you can write to her yourself.                                                                                                                                                                                                      There is also a DVDr rip available at cinemageddon dot net  but I lack the technical expertise to create a dvd from that type of file.

Youre welcome
